about_the_game:
Unlock the supreme power of Virusbane! Master the battlefield with the new cell, unleashing a devastating storm of blades to annihilate viruses. Get the DLC now and elevate your gaming experience to epic heights!

Gear up for battle!


Are you ready to face the most intense and thrilling challenges? Then waste no time and get your hands on the latest Survivor Cells DLC now!

New Cell, New Challenges!




With the arrival of Virusbane, a powerful cell with unique abilities, your journey to combat viruses and bacteria will reach epic levels! Master the battlefield, achieve unimaginable scores, and extend your life in the game to tackle even greater challenges!

Personalize Your Experience!


Unique visuals: Customize your cells with this special item and stand out on the battlefield!



Surpass all limits!




This paid DLC offers an exciting addition to the Survivor Cells universe, packed with new possibilities and challenges for players to explore. Don't wait any longer! Get yours now and embark on this incredible journey towards victory!

name: Survivor Cells - Virusbane

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Win 10
